column4: sorry i got disc... i want to know if there is a default root password..
no. Use sudo & your own user pw
for basic FTP, Nautilus does nicely. For everything else, use Filezilla.
FileZilla doesn't work with Linux-based OSes, does it?
the Linux version is in stable beta.
and it's in Universe as of Feisty
Do you use it?
when I moved to Ubuntu from XP, that was (seriously) the only app I actually missed. Glad the Linux port works now.
Yeah, me too. I'm happy that there's a linux port now. How long has it been unavailable?
the Linux port came out earlier this year, and made it into Feisty back in April
How do you log out of FTP sessions in Nautilus?
just collapse the file tree.
I tried kftpgrabber when I was using Kubuntu.. it's a good application as well, but not quite as good as Filezilla.
Is there any way to get Filezilla to use icons from the Human theme?
don't think so - it uses some 3rd party widget library
still here?
yes - what's up?
I found a way to use Tango icons with Filezilla
what's the trick?
Just pick up the icon set here: http://sumowski.deviantart.com/art/FileZilla-Tango-55312081
and go to /usr/share/filezilla/resources/16x16/
very cool - thanks! Bookmarked that.
